CustomField.description:
Type of Absense with relevant Mepco Code
15= pekkanen (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Pekkanen) 25= tuntityö (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Installation work) 30= sairaus (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Sick leave) 35= poissaolo (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Other) 40= loma (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Vacation) 45= lomautus (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Other) 50= sisäinen työ (Type value from TimeSheetEntry is Internal work)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Type of Absense with relevant Mepco Code
